.. _table_writer:

**************************************************
Table Writer (:mod:`~labreportpy.io.table_writer`)
**************************************************

.. currentmodule:: labreportpy.io.table_writer

Convert data from a :class:`~pandas.DataFrame` to a LaTeX tabularx/tabularray readable format.

=============
